item.description:
April 28 SAT 2012

venue and time  confirmed !

April 28th 9:30am - 4pm at the Lavine Center at City Year HQ 287 Columbus Ave. Boston, MA 02116, Copley Sq Boston. Near Back Bay Station, many bus lines and Copley T.


Participating Schools:
Boston Latin Academy
Lynn Classical High School
Everett High School
Lawrence Humanities and Leadership High School
Newburyport High School
Andover High School
South Community High School - Worcester
Revere High School
Chelsea High School
two other high schools may be added.

This event is free and open to the public.


Final StoriesLive® Scholarship Slam: April 28th:

9:00 am Event contestants, organizers and volunteers are admitted to the venue
9:30 am Event attendees register by 10 for a spot in the slam

10:00 am Junior Story Slam session begins


11:30 am Junior session ends— break for light lunch and pizza party for students in Education room 
12:30 pm Senior Story Slam contestenats sign in 1:00PM Senior Story Slam begins
2:30 pm Senior session ends

3:00PM All winners (both divisions ) are announced at the end 
4:00 pm we are out of space and... enjoying a spring day in downtown Boston !

group.name: Greater Boston and MA Storytelling Meetup Group

item.name: StoriesLive® High School Scholarship Story Slam
